titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that donations solicited by charitable organizations for the victims of the terrorist attacks against the United States that occurred on September 11, 2001, should be used exclusively for the benefit of such victims.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 11/16/2001--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that donations solicited by charitable organizations for the victims of the terrorist attacks against the United States that occurred on September 11, 2001, should be used exclusively for the benefit of such victims.
